comments: Ball (CHA) takes legal dribbles as he drives toward and away from the basket.
McDaniels (MIN) moves alongside of Rozier's (CHA) path to the basket and marginal body contact occurs that does not affect his SQBR.
McDaniels (MIN) makes contact to Harrell's (CHA) right arm and affects his putback shot attempt.
Plumlee (CHA) legally contests Towns' (MIN) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Ball (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Towns (MIN) and as he leans forward, marginal contact occurs as the two players engage.
Towns (MIN) makes marginal body contact with Harrell (CHA) during his drive to the basket.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: The pass from Harrell (CHA) is last touched by Bridges (CHA) before going out of bounds.
Bridges (CHA) briefly has two hands placed on Towns (MIN) on the perimeter as both players remain stationary.  As Towns begins to move, Bridges disengages and the contact does not affect his FOM.
Washington (CHA) makes incidental contact with Russell's (MIN) arm after the release that does not affect his jump shot attempt.
Bridges (CHA) moves his pivot foot heel-to-toe and then lifts and re-plants it before releasing his dribble.
Bridges (CHA) loses his balance and legally maintains his dribble, continuing his drive to the basket.
Towns (MIN) attempts to jump vertically but jumps into the side of Bridges (CHA) and initiates body and arm contact that affects his shot attempt at the rim.
Plumlee (CHA) makes marginal contact with Towns (MIN) as he switches on to Russell (MIN).
Plumlee (CHA) legally contests Russell's (MIN) jump shot attempt.
Russell (MIN) places a hand on Bridges' (CHA) body but the marginal contact does not affect his drive to the basket or shot attempt.
Towns (MIN) does not have his arms in a vertical position when he makes contact to Bridges' (CHA) arm and affects his shot attempt at the rim.
Beverley (MIN) establishes himself in a legal screening position in Washington's (CHA) path and Washington dislodges him from his screening position.

Bridges (CHA) has a hand extended towards Russell (MIN) and removes it as Russell attempts to rip through.  Any contact is marginal and Bridges avoids making any illegal contact with Russell's arm during the move.
Vanderbilt (MIN) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
McDaniels (MIN) maintains a legal guarding position during Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) drive to the basket.  Any contact during his shot attempt is considered marginal.
Both Oubre Jr. (CHA) and McDaniels (MIN) get their hands on the rebound and incidental contact occurs as the ball becomes loose.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) reaches in and makes contact to Beverley's (MIN) arm that affects his SQBR.
McDaniels (MIN) makes contact to Bridges' (CHA) arm that affects his shot attempt at the rim.
Washington (CHA) places a forearm on Vanderbilt's (MIN) back, but does not extend into him during the rebound and the contact is marginal.
Vanderbilt (MIN) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Beverley (MIN) wraps his arm around Plumlee (CHA) and pulls him, affecting his FOM following the screen.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) places an arm to Russell's (MIN) front and initiates contact that affects his SQBR.
Russell (MIN) is already falling off-balance when Oubre Jr. (CHA) reaches in and makes marginal contact.
Bridges (CHA) jumps from point A to point B into Russell's (MIN) body and affects his driving shot attempt.  Russell does not overtly launch into Bridges' body to create the contact.
McDaniels (MIN) moves alongside of Oubre Jr. (CHA) during his drive to the basket and the contact is marginal and does not affect his shot attempt.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) commits a take foul on McDaniels (MIN).
Beverley (MIN) reaches in and makes clean contact with the ball and the ensuing contact is incidental.
Plumlee (CHA) commits a take foul on McLaughlin (MIN).
Russell (MIN) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
